abstract: The Federal Bureau of Investigation is investigating a hacking that targeted Citigroup and resulted in the theft of tens of million of dollars, the Wall Street Journal said, citing U.S. government officials.

lead_paragraph: The Federal Bureau of Investigation is investigating a hacking that targeted Citigroup and resulted in the theft of tens of million of dollars, the Wall Street Journal said, citing United States government officials.

headline.main: F.B.I. Is Said to Investigate a Hacking at Citibank
